title: 我点的发布贴子怎么会成了草稿？
author: wanwusang
txt_content:
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=603502
怎么把草稿变成发布的贴子？

replies.author: Forsworn_
replies.txt_content: 再编辑一次 下面应该有发布

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content: 点一下“编辑”，然后你就看到“发布”了。

replies.author: john180
replies.txt_content: 再点编辑 发布即可.
